From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To display the configuration prompt (config), use the **service prompt config** command in global configuration mode. To remove the configuration prompt, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: In the following example, the noservice prompt config command prevents the configuration prompt from being displayed. The prompt is still displayed in EXEC mode. When the service prompt config command is entered, the configuration mode prompt reappears.
Enter configuration commands, one per line. End with CNTL/Z.
Enter configuration commands, one per line. End with CNTL/Z.

RelatedCmds.description: Specifies or modifies the host name for the network server.
